Chris Ronzio
Founder & CEO, Organize Chaos | Serial Entrepreneur | Author | Speaker
December 13, 2016, Anthony was a client of Chris’

My company was in a position of rapid growth and needed the processes, documentation, guidance to scale and handle all of the procurement. I started asking around industry friends, Chris and his company came highly recommend from several business owners I trusted, so I gave him a call and hired him quickly after. Chris took an extreme hands on approach and was able to understand all issues we were facing (some we didn't even realize were causing inefficiencies, redundancies, etc). He then put together an actionable checklist of things needed to be completed/shifted in order for us to continue with our rapid growth. I can confidently say my company would not be where it is today without the help of Chris and his operational guidance. He has saved us countless headaches and allowed our company to break through the plateau we were facing prior to working with him. I will be forever grateful for the impact Chris has made on both my personal organization and business!

summary: Forbes- "Top References for Marketing Trends in 2016"http://www.forbes.com/sites/ajagrawal/2015/12/21/10-examples-of-ads-that-pull-on-emotion/#15e70c6f4d52Inc Magazine- "Top Branding/Marketing Experts to Look out for in 2017"http://www.inc.com/ilya-pozin/9-branding-experts-to-look-out-for-in-2017.htmlEntrepreneur Magazine contributor- 5 Marketing Trends Business Owners Should Know in 2016https://www.entrepreneur.com/article/281025ASU College of Entrepreneurship + Innovation Venture Mentor Consultant/ProfessorJetset Magazine "Entrepreneurs who are changing the world"http://www.jetsetmag.com/exclusive/business/entrepreneurs-changing-the-world/SiteFlood was founded by current owner and CEO Anthony Sarandrea with a vision to provide consulting services that exceed the goals and expectations of clients. “After working in a large corporate agency, I realized businesses were getting neglected by the high volume of clients held by these corporations.” SiteFlood was born to be able to provide individual attention to each and every client, we care for each client and their business as if it were our own. “I formed my first business with $20 and promise your advertising dollars will be treated like I treated that first $20, every penny counts and it is SiteFlood’s job to make sure your business sees every opportunity to be successful.”Real client's testimonial:"SiteFlood is managing our PPC & SEO strategy, they have saved us a fortune. I would definitely recommend sitting down with Anthony. I've worked with three other companies and almost gave up on finding a good consultant, then I found SiteFlood. Anthony and his team will give you daily reports and clearly define how he is growing your companies bottom line. I recommend them very highly and think they would be an asset to your business."​-Stephanie Graham
